GSD.impact: risk of use of older protocols / slower firmware patching speed / rushed instable updates
GSD.notes:
Firmware versions only available using their Forum.
Forum seems to have some availibility problems from time to time which makes it hard to get updates or information.
GSD.description: In Netonix WISP version general a Risk exists in the Firmware update frequency/method/stability that can be attacked via N/A resulting in risk of use of older protocols / slower firmware patching speed / rushed instable updates
